thread.title: Unknown
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Unknown

author: Unknown
title: Unknown
text: Ordering online was a complete breeze. Collecting from store was an other matter, staff in Patrick Street couldnt have a bigger attitude problem if they tried. Ive been in store numerous times and all you get from them is an attitude that they are too good to be working there, everything is a chore and no one is willing to go the extra mile for good customer service. No wonder companies are moving more towards e commerece !
